name: Retreat!
description:
This game is an assignment based project.

We've lost the battle! Retreat to the castle walls! There's only six of us, but together, we can make it through.

Play as a survivor unit from an unnamed war, a six-man squad consisting of survivors from the previous skirmish. Two assassins, two vanguards and two heavies, use their unique class-based abilities to escape to the castle walls.

Bring as many of your units back as possible - letting half the squad die results in a game over!

INSTRUCTIONS

  • Tap to select a unit
  • Drag and hold to select multiple units
  • Use the joystick to move the camera - the camera will not turn. Note that moving the camera deselects all units.
  • Double tap on the desired location to move the selected unit
